name: Seepath Solutions
tag_list: software-as-a-service, cloud-computing, microsoft-online-services, business-process-consulting, force-com, salesforce-com-crm-consulting, cloud-business-solutions, it-consulting
overview:
Seepath Solutions implement business solutions in the Cloud using Software as a Service model (SaaS) realizing compelling business benefits for SMB as well as Enterprise Customers

By partnering with Microsoft Online Services and Salesforce.com, Seepath provides SaaS Advisory Services, Business Process Review, SaaS Strategy, Technology Selection, Implementation, SaaS transition and on-going support. Seepath serves customers across industries - Financial Services, Banking, Telecom, and Media & Public Sector.

Seepath is a Small and Minority Business Enterprise certified by State of NJ and DMBE Virginia.gov.

(1) Build and Run the business on the Cloud using Force.com & Microsoft Technologies. (2) Implement CRM Business Solutions based on Microsoft Dynamics CRM & Salesforce.com (on-demand as well as on-premise) (3) System Integration and Remote IT Infrastructure Management (4) Management and Technology Consulting
